statements: SELECT * FROM SoilNutrientAndCropYield WHERE location='Farm1';
SELECT id, yield_per_acre FROM SoilNutrientAndCropYield WHERE nutrient_level > 2.5;
SELECT location, timestamp FROM SoilNutrientAndCropYield ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(nutrient_level) AS avg_nutrient_level FROM SoilNutrientAndCropYield WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(yield_per_acre) AS max_yield FROM SoilNutrientAndCropYield WHERE location LIKE '%Field%';
SELECT * FROM SoilNutrientAndCropYield WHERE nutrient_level > 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location, yield_per_acre FROM SoilNutrientAndCropYield WHERE location = 'Farm A';
SELECT AVG(yield_per_acre) AS avg_yield, MAX(nutrient_level) AS max_nutrient FROM SoilNutrientAndCropYield WHERE location = 'Field C' GROUP BY location;
SELECT id, nutrient_level, timestamp FROM SoilNutrientAndCropYield WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS count FROM SoilNutrientAndCropYield GROUP BY location ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM SoilNutrientLevels;
SELECT location, nitrogen_level FROM SoilNutrientLevels WHERE phosphorus_level > 0.5;
SELECT id, location FROM SoilNutrientLevels ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT crop_type, yield FROM CropYieldData WHERE yield >= 1000;
SELECT * FROM CropYieldData WHERE soil_id IN (SELECT id FROM SoilNutrientLevels WHERE nitrogen_level < 0.3);
SELECT * FROM SoilNutrientLevels WHERE nitrogen_level > 0.5;
SELECT location, nitrogen_level FROM SoilNutrientLevels ORDER BY nitrogen_level DESC;
SELECT crop_type, yield FROM CropYieldData WHERE yield > 100 ORDER BY yield DESC;
SELECT * FROM CropYieldData WHERE crop_type LIKE 'Wheat%';
SELECT location, nitrogen_level, phosphorus_level FROM SoilNutrientLevels WHERE nitrogen_level < 0.3 OR phosphorus_level > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM SoilNutrientLevels;
SELECT soil_id, nitrogen_level FROM SoilNutrientLevels ORDER BY nitrogen_level DESC;
SELECT field_name, area FROM FieldData WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT crop_name, season FROM CropYieldData ORDER BY season DESC, crop_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM CropYieldData WHERE yield_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM SoilNutrientLevels WHERE nitrogen_level > 0.5 ORDER BY potassium_level DESC
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount FROM CropYieldData WHERE season = 'Summer' AND yield_amount > 100 ORDER BY yield_amount DESC
SELECT field_name, area, location FROM FieldData WHERE area > 50 AND location = 'North' ORDER BY field_name
SELECT * FROM SoilNutrientLevels WHERE phosphorus_level BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.5 ORDER BY soil_id
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount, season FROM CropYieldData WHERE yield_amount < 50 OR season = 'Spring' ORDER BY crop_name
SELECT * FROM soil_nutrient_levels;
SELECT field_id, latitude, longitude FROM field_locations;
SELECT crop_id, crop_name, yield_amount FROM crop_yield_data WHERE yield_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation ORDER BY rotation_date DESC;
SELECT crop_id, COUNT(*) AS rotation_count FROM crop_rotation GROUP BY crop_id;
SELECT * FROM soil_nutrient_levels ORDER BY nitrogen_level DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount FROM crop_yield_data WHERE yield_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY yield_amount DESC
SELECT field_name, latitude, longitude FROM field_locations WHERE latitude < 40 AND longitude > -100
SELECT soil_id, nitrogen_level, phosphorus_level, potassium_level FROM soil_nutrient_levels WHERE nitrogen_level > 0.5 AND phosphorus_level < 0.3

SELECT c.crop_name, cr.crop_name AS previous_crop FROM crop_yield_data c JOIN crop_rotation r ON c.crop_id = r.crop_id JOIN crop_yield_data cr ON r.previous_crop_id = cr.crop_id ORDER BY c.yield_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM SoilNutrientLevels;
SELECT id, location, nitrogen FROM SoilNutrientLevels WHERE location='Field A';
SELECT crop_name, yield FROM CropYields WHERE yield > 100;
SELECT * FROM FieldData ORDER BY field_name ASC;
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE date='2022-07-15';
SELECT * FROM CropYields WHERE season = 'Summer';
SELECT location, nitrogen, phosphorus FROM SoilNutrientLevels WHERE potassium > 0.5 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT crop_name, yield FROM CropYields ORDER BY yield DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT field_name, crop_id, nutrient_id FROM FieldData WHERE field_name LIKE 'Field%' AND crop_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity < 60 ORDER BY date DESC;
